companion."},{"lineNumber":219886,"originalJapaneseLine":"評定からの準備の速度は凄まじく、","translatedEnglishLine":"The speed of preparation from the council's decision was astonishing,"},{"lineNumber":219887,"originalJapaneseLine":"たった数時間で出発の準備は整い、","translatedEnglishLine":"and in just a few hours, preparations for departure were Castle."},{"lineNumber":219889,"originalJapaneseLine":"国主である乱義を始め、","translatedEnglishLine":"Starting with Rangii, the lord of the country,"},{"lineNumber":219890,"originalJapaneseLine":"大量の乱義の臣下と共に行う旅は、","translatedEnglishLine":"the journey undertaken with a large number of Rangii’s retainers,"},{"lineNumber":219891,"originalJapaneseLine":"今までになく賑やかなものだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"was livelier than any journey before."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僕達と同じ父を持つ魔王の子だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She is a child of the Demon King, who has the same father as us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気の抜けた返事を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Such a lackluster response..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「深根ちゃん、私達はね遊びに誘いに来たの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fukane-chan, we've come to invite you to play."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「遊びに？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To play?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのね、今私達ね、＜エール＞ちゃんに誘われて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, right now, we've been invited by <Aile>-chan,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お父さんを倒す為にね、兄弟姉妹で集まって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to gather as siblings and brothers to defeat our father,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冒険をしているの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we're going on an adventure."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、さっき乱義兄様に聞いた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, I just heard it from older brother Rangii."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「深根ちゃんも一緒に行かない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fukane-chan, won't you come with us?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんまり難しく考えなくていいよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You don't have to think too hard about it, okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お父さんを倒す為の冒険だけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Though it's an adventure to defeat our father...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当は家族旅行なんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's really more of a family trip."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼスに行って美味しいもの食べるよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We'll go to Zess and eat delicious food, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンに行って雪を見るよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll go to Helman and see the snow."
"Snow...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、なにそれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, what's that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼ばれてない。私、知らない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wasn't invited. I don't know about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だからこうして誘いに来たの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's why I've come to invite you like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「深根ちゃんも一緒に行こう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fukane-chan, let's go together, okay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ナギちゃんや志津香さんもいるよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nagi-chan and Shizuka-san will be there too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜はみんなでキャンプしたりするよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At night, we'll all camp together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと楽しいよ？　どうする？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It'll surely be fun, okay? So, what do you say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「行く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対に行く」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll definitely go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、一緒に行こうねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, let's go together!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、絶対に行く」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, I'll definitely go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつから？　今から？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From when? Right now?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと待ってて、準備してくる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a moment, I’ll go prepare."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、この子は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Really, this kid..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「深根、かわやに行かなくていいのかい？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fukane, don’t you need to go to the restroom?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かわや？　今、おしっこ出ないよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Restroom? I don’t need to pee right now."
"Sigh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんか……また変な奴が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow... another strange one has appeared..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、魔王の子一のマイペース娘ではあるかなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, she might just be the most laid-back child of the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、どんな子かはその内よく分かるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, you’ll get to know what kind of girl she is soon enough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私……深根、苦手なのよね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I... I’m not good with Fukane, you know..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの志津香さんが苦手と称するほどの娘……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A girl whom even Shizuka-san calls ‘difficult’...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごくり……こりゃただものじゃなさそうだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *gulp*... She doesn’t seem like an ordinary person..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞、お前呑まれんじゃねーぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "<Aile>, don’t get overwhelmed, okay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とっ、おい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-hey..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深根があなたの前に座り直した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fukane repositioned herself and sat down in front of you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これからご迷惑おかけします。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From now on, I will be causing you trouble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深根と申します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My name is Fukane."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「宜しくね、＜エール＞ちゃん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nice to meet you, <Aile>-chan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「初対面で＜エール＞ちゃん呼び……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Calling her <Aile>-chan on the first meeting..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リセット、お前がそう呼ぶから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Reset, because you call her that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深根が真似してしまったじゃないか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fukane ended up mimicking you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへへ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehehe..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、あなたに深根という
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus, a mysterious girl named Fukane joined you as an ally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不思議な少女が仲間に増えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You gained a mysterious girl named Fukane as a companion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 評定からの準備の速度は凄まじく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The speed of preparation from the council's decision was astonishing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たった数時間で出発の準備は整い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and in just a few hours, preparations for departure were complete,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は織田城を発った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and you all set out from Oda Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国主である乱義を始め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Starting with Rangii, the lord of the country,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量の乱義の臣下と共に行う旅は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the journey undertaken with a large number of Rangii’s retainers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までになく賑やかなものだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was livelier than any journey before.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僕達と同じ父を持つ魔王の子だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She is a child of the Demon King, who has the same father as us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気の抜けた返事を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Such a lackluster response..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「深根ちゃん、私達はね遊びに誘いに来たの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fukane-chan, we've come to invite you to play."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「遊びに？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To play?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのね、今私達ね、＜エール＞ちゃんに誘われて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, right now, we've been invited by <Aile>-chan,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お父さんを倒す為にね、兄弟姉妹で集まって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to gather as siblings and brothers to defeat our father,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冒険をしているの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we're going on an adventure."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、さっき乱義兄様に聞いた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, I just heard it from older brother Rangii."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「深根ちゃんも一緒に行かない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fukane-chan, won't you come with us?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんまり難しく考えなくていいよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You don't have to think too hard about it, okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お父さんを倒す為の冒険だけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Though it's an adventure to defeat our father...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当は家族旅行なんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's really more of a family trip."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼスに行って美味しいもの食べるよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We'll go to Zess and eat delicious food, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンに行って雪を見るよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll go to Helman and see the snow."
"Snow...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、なにそれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, what's that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼ばれてない。私、知らない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wasn't invited. I don't know about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だからこうして誘いに来たの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's why I've come to invite you like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「深根ちゃんも一緒に行こう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fukane-chan, let's go together, okay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ナギちゃんや志津香さんもいるよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nagi-chan and Shizuka-san will be there too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜はみんなでキャンプしたりするよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At night, we'll all camp together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと楽しいよ？　どうする？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It'll surely be fun, okay? So, what do you say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「行く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対に行く」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll definitely go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、一緒に行こうねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, let's go together!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、絶対に行く」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, I'll definitely go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつから？　今から？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From when? Right now?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと待ってて、準備してくる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a moment, I’ll go prepare."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、この子は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Really, this kid..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「深根、かわやに行かなくていいのかい？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fukane, don’t you need to go to the restroom?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かわや？　今、おしっこ出ないよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Restroom? I don’t need to pee right now."
"Sigh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんか……また変な奴が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow... another strange one has appeared..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、魔王の子一のマイペース娘ではあるかなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, she might just be the most laid-back child of the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、どんな子かはその内よく分かるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, you’ll get to know what kind of girl she is soon enough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私……深根、苦手なのよね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I... I’m not good with Fukane, you know..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの志津香さんが苦手と称するほどの娘……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A girl whom even Shizuka-san calls ‘difficult’...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごくり……こりゃただものじゃなさそうだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *gulp*... She doesn’t seem like an ordinary person..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞、お前呑まれんじゃねーぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "<Aile>, don’t get overwhelmed, okay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とっ、おい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-hey..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深根があなたの前に座り直した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fukane repositioned herself and sat down in front of you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これからご迷惑おかけします。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From now on, I will be causing you trouble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深根と申します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My name is Fukane."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「宜しくね、＜エール＞ちゃん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nice to meet you, <Aile>-chan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「初対面で＜エール＞ちゃん呼び……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Calling her <Aile>-chan on the first meeting..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リセット、お前がそう呼ぶから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Reset, because you call her that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深根が真似してしまったじゃないか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fukane ended up mimicking you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへへ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehehe..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、あなたに深根という
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus, a mysterious girl named Fukane joined you as an ally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不思議な少女が仲間に増えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You gained a mysterious girl named Fukane as a companion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 評定からの準備の速度は凄まじく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The speed of preparation from the council's decision was astonishing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たった数時間で出発の準備は整い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and in just a few hours, preparations for departure were complete,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は織田城を発った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and you all set out from Oda Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国主である乱義を始め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Starting with Rangii, the lord of the country,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量の乱義の臣下と共に行う旅は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the journey undertaken with a large number of Rangii’s retainers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までになく賑やかなものだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was livelier than any journey before.
